Text:
Do not upload the same torrent item more than once.
I have deleted your previous upload of this.

@velvet I'm srry i tried to use google crome first but it didn't work so i tried IE and it worked and after 2 mins i had upploaded 2 same torrents Oo
I'm new on this so i guess it's my fault.

Info about the game!:

Working on Windws 95/98/XP/Vista/7

1. Unzip the file
2. Run SETUP.exe
3. Install
4. Open your directory where you installed the game (ex:C:\I-Magic\Thunder Brigade)
5. Run Tbrigade.exe

6. PLAY!
